posts.post_content:
Hello All!

I just got back some MORE freshly-graded T205s!

This will be my only price drop before these cards hit eBay this weekend.

[STRIKE]PHILLIPPE – Blue Piedmont 25 – PSA 4 – [STRIKE]$50[/STRIKE] $45[/STRIKE] - SOLD

[STRIKE]DOOIN – Hassan 30 – PSA 4 – [STRIKE]$50[/STRIKE] $45[/STRIKE] - SOLD

[STRIKE]SHEAN – CUBS - Hassan 649 – PSA 2.5 – [STRIKE]$75[/STRIKE] $65[/STRIKE] - SOLD

[STRIKE]RAYMOND – Blue Piedmont 25 – PSA 1 – $35[/STRIKE] - SOLD

[STRIKE]WILTSE – Both Ears Show – Hassan 649 – PSA 3 – $35[/STRIKE] - SOLD

[STRIKE]TITUS – Polar Bear – PSA 4 – [STRIKE]$50[/STRIKE] $45[/STRIKE] - SOLD!

Please message me if you are interested.  I will sell these cards in the order that I receive your requests. "A commitment to buy takes precedence over ongoing negotiations.”  (I stole that phraseology from someone, but I DO like it!)

(All prices are “Net to Me” and include shipping.)

PayPal – Friends or Family is preferred OR “Regular” PayPal + 3%!

Thank you for your consideration!

I'll take Wiltse...pm forthcoming!


Sent from my iPad using Tapatalk
This will be my only price drop before they hit eBay this weekend.  THANK YOU for looking!
